body:
I am getting a consistently failing unit test when running the tests in the included MariaDB 10.3 in Debian 10:

```
ok  	vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver/txthrottler	0.006s
E1208 13:37:09.421705   23501 vstreamer.go:648] stream error @ mysql-bin.000001:8168: unexpected statement type UNKNOWN in row-based replication: "# Dummy event replacing"
--- FAIL: TestStatements (0.21s)
    vstreamer_test.go:1024: Received events: [type:BEGIN timestamp:1575837429 current_time:1575837429278786101  type:FIELD timestamp:1575837429 field_event:<table_name:"stream1" fields:<name:"id" type:INT32 > fields:<name:"val" type:VARBINARY > > current_time:1575837429278857747  type:ROW timestamp:1575837429 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1aaa" > > > current_time:1575837429278874257  type:ROW timestamp:1575837429 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1aaa" > after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1bbb" > > > current_time:1575837429278881360  type:GTID timestamp:1575837429 gtid:"MariaDB/0-512139536-31" current_time:1575837429278885438  type:COMMIT timestamp:1575837429 current_time:1575837429278885588 ]
    vstreamer_test.go:1024: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1575837429 gtid:"MariaDB/0-512139536-32" current_time:1575837429286258416  type:DDL timestamp:1575837429 ddl:"alter table stream1 change column val val varbinary(128)" current_time:1575837429286258557 ]
    vstreamer_test.go:1024: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1575837429 gtid:"MariaDB/0-512139536-33" current_time:1575837429335793923  type:DDL timestamp:1575837429 ddl:"/* prefix */ alter table stream1 change column val val varbinary(256) /* suffix */" current_time:1575837429335794264 ]
    vstreamer_test.go:1024: Received events: [type:BEGIN timestamp:1575837429 current_time:1575837429341292773  type:FIELD timestamp:1575837429 field_event:<table_name:"stream1" fields:<name:"id" type:INT32 > fields:<name:"val" type:VARBINARY > > current_time:1575837429341331536  type:ROW timestamp:1575837429 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"2bbb" > > > current_time:1575837429341345482  type:FIELD timestamp:1575837429 field_event:<table_name:"stream2" fields:<name:"id" type:INT32 > fields:<name:"val" type:VARBINARY > > current_time:1575837429341357235  type:ROW timestamp:1575837429 row_event:<table_name:"stream2" row_changes:<after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1aaa" > > > current_time:1575837429341365089  type:ROW timestamp:1575837429 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1bbb" > after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1ccc" > > row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"2bbb" > after:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"2ccc" > > > current_time:1575837429341377473  type:ROW timestamp:1575837429 row_event:<table_name:"stream1" row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"1ccc" > > row_changes:<before:<lengths:1 lengths:3 values:"2ccc" > > > current_time:1575837429341387041  type:GTID timestamp:1575837429 gtid:"MariaDB/0-512139536-34" current_time:1575837429341393553  type:COMMIT timestamp:1575837429 current_time:1575837429341393814 ]
    vstreamer_test.go:1024: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1575837429 gtid:"MariaDB/0-512139536-35" current_time:1575837429376736950  type:DDL timestamp:1575837429 ddl:"truncate table stream2" current_time:1575837429376737411 ]
    vstreamer_test.go:1024: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1575837429 gtid:"MariaDB/0-512139536-36" current_time:1575837429381048469  type:OTHER timestamp:1575837429 current_time:1575837429381048760 ]
    vstreamer_test.go:1024: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1575837429 gtid:"MariaDB/0-512139536-37" current_time:1575837429409373707  type:OTHER timestamp:1575837429 current_time:1575837429409374549 ]
    vstreamer_test.go:1024: Received events: [type:GTID timestamp:1575837429 gtid:"MariaDB/0-512139536-38" current_time:1575837429413679285  type:OTHER timestamp:1575837429 current_time:1575837429413679656 ]
    vstreamer_test.go:1009: stream error @ mysql-bin.000001:8168: unexpected statement type UNKNOWN in row-based replication: "# Dummy event replacing"
    vstreamer_test.go:148: stream ended early
E1208 13:37:09.751341   23501 vstreamer.go:648] stream error @ 0-512139536-63: cannot determine table columns for ddl_test2: event has [3 15 15], schema as [{id INT32 false NULL} {val1 VARBINARY false NULL}]
E1208 13:37:10.226254   23501 vstreamer.go:648] stream error @ 0-512139536-105: partial row image encountered: ensure binlog_row_image is set to 'full'
FAIL
FAIL	vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttablet/tabletserver/vstreamer	6.697s
ok  	vitess.io/vitess/go/vt/vttime	(cached)

```

@sougou do you mind taking a look?
title: failing unit test: vttablet/tabletserver/vstreamer on Debian10/MariaDB 10.3
